trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: 表示的整数 x 坐标和 y 坐标点定义二维平面中的有序的对。

trans-unit.source: To convert a Point to a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>类<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>的新指定的坐标<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class using coordinates specified by an integer value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>类使用的整数值指定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The low-order 16 bits of the `dw` parameter specify the horizontal x-coordinate and the higher 16 bits specify the vertical y-coordinate for the new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 个的低 16 位`dw`参数指定水平的 x 坐标和更高的 16 位指定新<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>垂直 y 坐标

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它的新指定的坐标<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>类指定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
The vertical position of the point.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

The Add adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 添加将添加<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>指定<xref:System.Drawing.Size>到<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>的指定点的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to add.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to add
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that is the result of the addition operation.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by rounding the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>到<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>通过舍入的值<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>到下一个较大的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that has <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> values set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>具有<> *1> 和<> *1> 值设置为零。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> contains the same coordinates as the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>包含相同的坐标指定<xref:System.Object>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test.
if obj is a and has the same coordinates as this .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 是并且具有与此相同的坐标 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: 你应避免具体取决于 GetHashCode 唯一值，作为两个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>的相同值的对象及其<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性可能会返回相同的哈希代码。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 未来版本中无法更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，指定此哈希值<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>为空。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> are 0; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if both <>*> and <>*> are 0; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

This method adjusts the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> and `p`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调整<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>值<xref:System.Drawing.Point>的要求和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>值<xref:System.Drawing.Point>和`p`。</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> used offset this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Translates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the specified amount.
The amount to offset the x-coordinate.
The amount to offset the y-coordinate.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to translate.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，它指定要添加的坐标的数字对`pt`。

trans-unit.source: The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects.
The result specifies whether the values of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 此结果指定是否的值<> *1> 和<> *1> 这两个属性<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>对象是否相等。

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
if the and values of left and right are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the <>*> and <>*> values of left and right are equal; otherwise, .

To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects.
The result specifies whether the values of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: 此结果指定是否的值<> *1> 或<> *1> 这两个属性<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>对象是否不相等。

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
if the values of either the properties or the properties of left and right differ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果任一值<> *1> 属性或<> *1> 属性 left 和 right 区分; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the negative of a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>的负值由给定<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to translate.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that specifies the pair of numbers to subtract from the coordinates of `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，它指定要减去的坐标的数字对`pt`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that is translated by the negative of a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>的负转换的结构给定<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> object by rounding the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> values to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>到<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>通过舍入的对象<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>到最接近的整数的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
Returns the result of subtracting specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回数减去指定的结果<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>从指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>。
